titles.title: To modify the project for navigation and environmental restoration, Houston-Galveston Navigation Channels, Texas, authorized by the Water Resources Development Act of 1996, and for other purposes.
To modify the project for navigation and environmental restoration, Houston-Galveston Navigation Channels, Texas, authorized by the Water Resources Development Act of 1996, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: Modifies the project for navigation and environmental restoration, Houston-Galveston Navigation Channels, Texas, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to extend the boundaries of the Galveston channel approximately 2600 feet beyond Pier 38, if deemed feasible.
